csv.title: How do I make a CSV file for Toodle?
csv.paragraph1: Making a CSV input file for Toodle is pretty straightforward at the moment.
csv.paragraph2: The first line should define the columns needed by Toodle to know what to figure from the file. Then each line will represent a player entry according to that description. For example :
csv.paragraph3: defines a list of 8 players whose names are on the 1st column and factions on the second.
csv.paragraph4: Only player names are mandatory, so you can do :
csv.paragraph5: which will create the same list as above, only with players "player 1" and "player 5" with no faction
csv.paragraph6: You can also skip the faction column altogether :
csv.legend3: This is also a valid example
